verses.verse: וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And at that time הַהִיא֩ <WH1931> who יַעֲמֹ֨ד <WH5975> stand up מִֽיכָאֵ֜ל <WH4317> shall Michael הַשַּׂ֣ר <WH8269> prince הַגָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> the great הָעֹמֵד֮ <WH5975> which standeth עַל־ <WH5921> over בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> for the children עַמֶּךָ֒ <WH5971> of thy people וְהָיְתָה֙ <WH1961> and there shall be עֵ֣ת <WH6256> a time צָרָ֔ה <WH6869> of trouble אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> such לֹֽא־ <WH3808> never נִהְיְתָה֙ <WH1961> occurred מִֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> occurred גּ֔וֹי <WH1471> such as never was since there was a nation עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> [even] to that same time הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> that וּבָעֵ֤ת <WH6256> and at that time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he יִמָּלֵ֣ט <WH4422> shall be delivered עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> thy people כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> every one that shall be found כָּת֥וּב <WH3789> written בַּסֵּֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> in the book

וְרַבִּ֕ים <WH7227> And many מִיְּשֵׁנֵ֥י <WH3463> of them that sleep אַדְמַת־ <WH127> of the earth עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> in the dust יָקִ֑יצוּ <WH6974> shall awake אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> these לְחַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> life עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> some to everlasting וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> the others לַחֲרָפ֖וֹת <WH2781> and some to shame לְדִרְא֥וֹן <WH1860> contempt עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [and] everlasting ס

וְהַ֨מַּשְׂכִּלִ֔ים <WH7919> And they that be wise יַזְהִ֖רוּ <WH2094> shall shine כְּזֹ֣הַר <WH2096> as the brightness הָרָקִ֑יעַ <WH7549> of the firmament וּמַצְדִּיקֵי֙ <WH6663> to righteousness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and they that turn many כַּכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> as the stars לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you דָֽנִיֵּ֗אל <WH1840> But thou O Daniel סְתֹ֧ם <WH5640> shut up הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1697> the words וַחֲתֹ֥ם <WH2856> and seal הַסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> the book עַד־ <WH5704> until עֵ֣ת <WH6256> [even] to the time קֵ֑ץ <WH7093> of the end יְשֹׁטְט֥וּ <WH7751> shall run to and fro רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> many וְתִרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> shall be increased הַדָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> and knowledge

וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> looked אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I דָנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> Then I Daniel וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other עֹמְדִ֑ים <WH5975> and behold there stood אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> the one הֵ֙נָּה֙ <WH2008> on this side לִשְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> of the bank הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> of the river וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and the other הֵ֖נָּה <WH2008> this לִשְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> on that side of the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> of the river

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And [one] said לָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> to the man לְב֣וּשׁ <WH3847> clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <WH906> in linen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מִמַּ֖עַל <WH4605> which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> of the river עַד־ <WH5704> until מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How קֵ֥ץ <WH7093> How long [shall it be to] the end הַפְּלָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6382> marvellous thing

וָאֶשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> And I heard אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> the man לְב֣וּשׁ <WH3847> clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH906> in linen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who מִמַּעַל֮ <WH4605> which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַיְאֹר֒ <WH2975> of the river וַיָּ֨רֶם <WH7311> when he held up יְמִינ֤וֹ <WH3225> his right hand וּשְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <WH8040> and his left hand אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> unto heaven וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> and sware בְּחֵ֣י <WH2416> by him that liveth הָעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever כִּי֩ <WH3588> would be for לְמוֹעֵ֨ד <WH4150> that [it shall be] for a time מֽוֹעֲדִ֜ים <WH4150> times וָחֵ֗צִי <WH2677> and an half וּכְכַלּ֛וֹת <WH3615> and when he shall have accomplished נַפֵּ֥ץ <WH5310> to scatter יַד־ <WH3027> the power עַם־ <WH5971> people קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy תִּכְלֶ֥ינָה <WH3615> all these [things] shall be finished כָל־ <WH3605> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <WH8085> And I heard וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אָבִ֑ין <WH995> but I understood וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <WH559> not then said אֲדֹנִ֕י <WH113> I O my Lord מָ֥ה <WH4100> what אַחֲרִ֖ית <WH319> what [shall be] the end אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> of these פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <WH1840> Daniel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סְתֻמִ֧ים <WH5640> [are] closed up וַחֲתֻמִ֛ים <WH2856> and sealed הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> for the words עַד־ <WH5704> until עֵ֥ת <WH6256> till the time קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> of the end

יִ֠תְבָּֽרֲרוּ <WH1305> shall be purified וְיִֽתְלַבְּנ֤וּ <WH3835> and made white וְיִצָּֽרְפוּ֙ <WH6884> and tried רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> Many וְהִרְשִׁ֣יעוּ <WH7561> shall do wickedly רְשָׁעִ֔ים <WH7563> but the wicked וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> shall understand כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> and none of the wicked וְהַמַּשְׂכִּלִ֖ים <WH7919> but the wise יָבִֽינוּ׃ <WH995> shall understand

וּמֵעֵת֙ <WH6256> And from the time הוּסַ֣ר <WH5493> [sacrifice] shall be taken away הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> [that] the daily וְלָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> set up שִׁקּ֣וּץ <WH8251> and the abomination שֹׁמֵ֑ם <WH8074> that maketh desolate יָמִ֕ים <WH3117> days אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> [there shall be] a thousand מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <WH8673> and ninety

אַשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> Blessed הַֽמְחַכֶּ֖ה <WH2442> [is] he that waiteth וְיַגִּ֑יעַ <WH5060> and cometh לְיָמִ֕ים <WH3117> days אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> to the thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five

וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go לַקֵּ֑ץ <WH7093> till the end וְתָנ֛וּחַ <WH5117> [be] for thou shalt rest וְתַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> and stand לְגֹרָלְךָ֖ <WH1486> in thy lot לְקֵ֥ץ <WH7093> at the end הַיָּמִֽין׃ <WH3117> of the days
